content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, a fluid box containing approximately 190.10 units of water at temperature 15, and connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); associated with fluid system 71990; steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING, delivering approximately 99.24 units of water, with a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and linked to fluid system 71990.
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 71990 at position(-5.5, 19.5) connecting multiple pipe segments.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 71989 at position(-2.5, 19.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72002 at position(5.5, 21.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72001 at position(1.5, 23.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 71997 at position(-7.5, 25.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72006 at position(0.5, 24.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72005 at position(1.5, 25.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72008 at position(1.5, 27.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72009 at position(4.5, 27.5).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 72010 at position(-0.5, 28.5).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure that both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within an effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before attempting to place entities.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise position attributes during placement to prevent type-related errors.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify candidate pipe groups are correctly assigned to a fluid system and are located within the required search radius.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Attempts:
  - Repeated attempts to reposition the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [71326, 71410, 71492, 71576, 71658, 71742, 71824, 71908] near position (-5.5, 19.5) yielded no candidates. Use confirmed working systems such as 71990, adjust the search radius, and ensure proper alignment with the associated pipeline network.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish boiler fuel levels in a timely manner to avoid operational shutdown.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels when attempting entity repositioning or pipeline attachments.
